title: The Line
creator_credit: Christopher McGill, Gil Brealey and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Made to commemorate the first crossing of Australia by the standard gauge railway line between Sydney and Perth. It does not attempt to trace this trip, rather capture the spirit of the crossing, to the accompaniment of a folk song and natural sounds.
creator_credit_for_label: Christopher McGill, Gil Brealey and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
